to: html
  output-file: index.html
  standalone: true
  title-prefix: Andrew Reeves
  section-divs: true
  html-math-method: mathjax
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  toc: false
  variables: {}
  
[1mmetadata[22m
  document-css: false
  link-citations: true
  date-format: long
  lang: en
  bibliography:
    - ../references.bib
  csl: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/citation-style-language/styles/master/american-political-science-association.csl
  theme:
    - cosmo
    - ../styles.scss
  page-layout: full
  grid:
    sidebar-width: 0px
    body-width: 1200px
    margin-width: 200px
  title: Research
  description: Publications on American political institutions, presidential power, and democratic governance
  listing:
    - id: books
      contents:
        - '*/index.md'
      type: grid
      grid-columns: 2
      grid-item-border: true
      fields:
        - image
        - title
        - date
        - description
        - tags
      filter-ui: false
      sort: date desc
      date-format: YYYY
      include:
        publication_type: book
    - id: all-publications
      contents:
        - '*/index.md'
      type: default
      fields:
        - image
        - title
        - date
        - journal_name
        - categories
        - publication_type
        - description
        - tags
      filter-ui: true
      sort: date desc
      page-size: 15
      date-format: YYYY
